casebody.data:
Adriana McQUILLAN and Sandra K. Matthis, on behalf of themselves and all other persons similarly situated
v.
CHECK `N GO OF NORTH CAROLINA, INC., CNG Financial Corporation, Jared A. Davis and A. David Davis. No. 462P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 5, 2006. J. Jerome Hartzell, Carlene McNulty, F. Paul Bland, Jr., Washington, DC, Mallam J. Maynard, Mona Lisa Wallace, Salisbury, John Hughes, Greensboro, Richard A. Fisher, Napoleon, OH, for McQuillan and Matthis. Alan D. McInnes, Alfred P. Carlton, Jr., Gregg E. McDougal, Raleigh, Amy L. Brown, Pierre H. Bergeron, Cincinnati, OH, Jeffrey M. Young, Research Triangle Park, for Check `N Go et al.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Plaintiffs on the 31st day of August 2006 in this matter for discretionary review under G.S. 7A-31 prior to a determination by the North Carolina Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th day of October 2006."
